name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Seasoned Senior Field Engineer with over 10 years of experience adept at technical problem solving, error analysis, and preventive maintenance within complex systems. Skilled in user training and creating comprehensive technical documentation, ensuring clarity in customer communication and quotation preparation. Proven ability to navigate helpdesk ticketing systems efficiently while maintaining strong communication and fostering team spirit. Leveraging a solution-oriented approach, I excel in delivering impactful solutions for clients in life sciences, adhering to ISO standards for quality assurance. My technical background includes expertise in high-performing APIs, automation tools, and scalable services, utilizing a tech stack that features **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask)** and cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**. Successfully contributed to key projects for esteemed organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
